title: TRESemme Keratin Smooth Keratin Infusing Conditioner, 25 oz
Cotz Pediatric Spf 40, 3.5 Ounce
description: CōTZ PEDIATRIC with Gentle Mineral Complex is Paediatrician Recommended to protect children’s thinner skin from damaging sun rays. CōTZ sits gently and invisibly on top of children’s skin and functions like thousands of mirrors to deflect UVA-UVB rays before the rays can touch or penetrate the skin. Contains the #1 rated sun protection ingredient against burning and aging rays. Pediatrician Recommended: Suitable for Infants, Toddlers & School-Age children (age: 6+ months) A Gentle Mineral Complex that helps prevent heat build-up in children’s skin, which can damage the dermis. CoTZ helps prevent burning and skin damage, which can lead to uneven skin tone and other serious skin problems.  CoTZ is 100% Free of chemical sunscreen ingredients, here’s why: Chemical sunscreens absorb UVA-UVB rays into the skin and transform the rays into heat, which can damage the dermis.

Pond's Luminous Finish BB Plus Cream with SPF 15, Light Shade, 1.5 Ounce
BabyGanics Foaming Hand Soap, Unscented, 8.45-Fluid Ounce Bottles (Pack of 2), Packaging May Vary
Babyganics Eczema Care Skin Protectant Cream, 8 oz, Packaging May Vary
Designer Whey Fit and Trim Premium Protein Powder with Soy, French Vanilla, 10 Ounce
description: Our passion for health and fitness continually drives us to deliver smart, simple and convenient products - designed for your active lifestyle - so that you can achieve your healthy weight goal, even with today's hectic schedules. Our proprietary slim blend is uniquely formulated with a premium protein blend of whey and soy, Clarinol CLA and prebiotic fiber to ultimately help curb appetite and reduce body fat while nourishing your body so you can manage your weight.

title: Eucerin Baby Eczema Relief Body Creme, 5 Ounce
description: Your skin is much more than your body's protective shield. For over 100 years Eucerin has pioneered skincare innovation and today we are recognized by dermatologists as one of the leading and most recommended brands. Our products are designated to protect, repair, and enhance the health of skin – Giving the feeling of confidence that comes from radiant, healthy looking skin. This unique formula with Oatmeal, Ceramide-3 and Licochalcone intensively moisturizes and helps relieve dry, irritated skin and itching due to eczema. Clinically proven immediate and long-lasting relief of itchy, dry, irritated skin due to eczema.

title: CeraVe Baby Lotion, 8 Ounce
description: Developed with pediatric dermatologists, CeraVe Baby Moisturizing Lotion is formulated with 3 essential ceramides (ceramide 3, ceramide 6-II, ceramide 1) and is free of parabens and phthalates for a healthy way to care for your baby’s delicate skin. Designed to temporarily protect and help relieve chafed, chapped or cracked skin. CeraVe Baby Moisturizing Lotion helps protect baby’s skin from the drying effects of wind and cold weather.
